TypeSignature.Value: public class ResourceDictionary : System.Collections.IDictionary, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Markup.INameScope, System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext

.class public auto ansi ResourceDictionary extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.Windows.Markup.INameScope, class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class ResourceDictionary Implements IDictionary, INameScope, ISupportInitialize, IUriContext
public ref class ResourceDictionary : System::Collections::IDictionary, System::ComponentModel::ISupportInitialize, System::Windows::Markup::INameScope, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext

summary.span: 提供雜湊表/字典實作，其中包含元件及 WPF 應用程式之其他項目所使用的 WPF 資源。

span.span: Provides a hash table / dictionary implementation that contains WPF resources used by components and other elements of a WPF application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目不會立即處理當應用程式程式碼由載入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]載入器。The items in a are not immediately processed when application code is loaded by a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] loader. 相反地，保存為物件，而且只有在特別要求時處理的個別值。Instead, the persists as an object, and the individual values are processed only when they are specifically requested. 類別不衍生自。The class is not derived from . 相反地，類別會實作但依賴內部。Instead, the class implements but relies on a internally. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]、類別通常是隱含的集合項目做為物件項目值的數個`Resources`屬性，指定屬性項目語法中時。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], the class is typically an implicit collection element that is the object element value of several `Resources` properties, when given in property element syntax. 如需詳細資訊中隱含的集合上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，請參閱[XAML 語法的詳細資料](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For details on implicit collections in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). 當您想要指定合併的字典; 例外狀況如需詳細資訊，請參閱[合併資源字典](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md)。An exception is when you want to specify a merged dictionary; for details, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md). 另一個可能[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的用法是，宣告視為離散的資源字典[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案，並在執行階段以載入它或 （完全信任） 專案中包含做為資源或鬆散的檔案。Another possible [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage is to declare a resource dictionary as a discrete [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, and either load it at run time with or include it in a (full-trust) project as a resource or loose file. 在此情況下，可以宣告為物件項目，做為根項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In this case, can be declared as an object element, serving as the root element of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 您必須將適當的 XML 命名空間值對應 (預設值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]命名空間而且通常`x:`的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]命名空間) 到項目，如果您打算使用的根項目。You must map the appropriate XML namespace values (default for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] namespace and typically `x:` for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] namespace) onto the element if you plan to use it as the root element. 然後您可以加入子項目定義的資源，每個都有[X:key](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)值。Then you can add child elements that define the resources, each with an [x:Key](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) value. ## XAML 隱含集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *resourcesProperty**resourcesProperty* 屬性，指定屬性的項目，其中該屬性的值型別是。A property specifying a property element, where the value type of that property is . 一般而言，這是`Resources`屬性或，或之應用程式資源的案例中。Typically, this is the `Resources` property of or , or of in an application resources case. *oneOrMoreResources**oneOrMoreResources* 做為物件項目指定的一或多個資源。One or more resources specified as object elements. 必須有您指定每個資源[X:key 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)指派。Each resource that you specify must have an [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法會指出，內容即將載入。Calling this method is an indication that the contents of the are about to be loaded. 處理程序的下一個步驟是呼叫。The next step in the process is to call . 請勿呼叫之前呼叫一次以上， 。Do not call more than once, before calling . 如此一來，將會引發例外狀況。Doing so will raise an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要清除合併的字典的項目時，取得從特定的字典集合和明確呼叫上，雖然字典通常是遠端，而且您可能無法再存取。If you need to clear merged dictionary items, obtain the particular dictionary from collection and specifically call on that , although typically the dictionaries are remote and you might not have access. 或者，移除整個從藉由呼叫泛型集合上移除。Alternatively, remove the entire from by calling Remove on the generic collection.

Value of the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要求的索引鍵不在這個資源字典中，則架構資源系統也會檢查合併的字典。If the requested key is not in this resource dictionary, the framework resource system will also check the merged dictionaries. 檢查依項目或索引不是一般慣用的方法來擷取資源。Checking a by item or index is not generally the preferred way to retrieve resources. 您應該改為呼叫和，它們可以參與完整的資源查閱程序，並且依其索引鍵，查詢資源，可以在應用程式或佈景主題來尋找資源的方法。You should instead call methods that are capable of participating in the full resource lookup process and look up resources by their keys, and that can find the resources in applications or themes. 為這類方法，且位於任何。 is such a method, and is present on any . 否則您嘗試尋找的資源不符合，則為 true 的執行階段行為。Otherwise your attempt to find the resource does not match the true run-time behavior. 不過，直接從個別的字典中取得資源可能適合您會從已知擷取資源位置，而且這樣做，因此若要避免執行階段的索引鍵查閱的可能效能和範圍含意。However, obtaining resources directly from an individual dictionary might be appropriate if you are retrieving resources from a known location, and are doing so to avoid the possible performance and scope implications of run-time key lookup. 您不使用索引子來定義中的集合成員[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You do not use indexers to define collection members in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 相反地，您建立子系項目在標記中。Instead, you create child elements in markup. 子元素是其中一個子元素的，或其中的屬性類型是屬性項目`ResourceDictionary`。The child elements are either child elements of , or of a property element where the property type is `ResourceDictionary`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]章節中的使用量。For details, see the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage sections in .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Keys { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個 中包含的所有索引鍵的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all keys contained in this .
The collection of all keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性存在，是因為所需，但通常並不是適用於大多數案例。This property exists because it is required by , but generally is not useful for most scenarios. 傳回索引鍵不包含內索引鍵。The returned keys do not include keys within the . 也索引鍵集合是快照集的基本字典中索引鍵。Also the keys collection is a snapshot of the keys in the base dictionary. 如果您隨後變更至此，預存將不會反映這些變更。If you subsequently make changes to this , a stored will not reflect the changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MergedDictionaries As Collection(Of ResourceDictionary)

summary.span: 取得 字典的集合，這些字典在合併字典中組成了各種資源字典。

span.span: Gets a collection of the dictionaries that constitute the various resource dictionaries in the merged dictionaries.
The collection of merged dictionaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典會將合併到一般集合所參考。Dictionaries are merged by adding a to the generic collection referenced by . 合併並沒有資源標記中定義於其中的項目。A merged does not have resource elements defined within it in markup. 相反地，合併的字典是具有任何標記子項目定義 （或透過程式碼新增的任何項目），但[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]指定。Instead, the merged dictionary is a with no markup child elements defined (or with no elements added through code), but with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] specified for . 指定可讓來自外部來源，例如不同的資源組件隨附應用程式時，合併的字典 」 鬆散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]」，或是特定當地語系化或全域資源組件。The designation enables the merged dictionary to come from an external source, such as a separate resource assembly that ships with the application, "loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]", or a specific localization or global resources assembly. 指定資源內的項目具有指定不支援。Specifying resource elements within a that has specified is not supported. 中的查閱行為集合將會搜尋最後加入，然後只要找到要求的索引鍵時，搜尋會停止。Lookup behavior within the collection will search the last-added first, and the search stops as soon as a requested key is found. 整個合併的字典集合內重複的索引鍵都不合法的。Duplicate keys across the collection of merged dictionaries are not illegal. 如需有關合併的字典行為的詳細資訊，請參閱[合併資源字典](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md)。For more information on merged dictionary behavior, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md). ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreResourceDictionaries**oneOrMoreResourceDictionaries* 一或多個物件項目。One or more object elements. A用於沒有集合的內容，並指定屬性必須參考完整遠端。A used for does not have collection content, and specifies a attribute that references the complete remotely. ## Examples 下列範例會指定兩個項目會合併至主要。The following example specifies two elements to be merged into the primary . [!code-xaml[ResourceMergeDictionary#MergedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ResourceMergeDictionary/CS/default.xaml#mergedxaml)]

XAML namescope 方法會實作為無作用中版本清楚該 XAML 名稱不會套用到資源。The XAML namescope methods are implemented as inoperative versions in to make it clear that XAML names do not apply to resources. 呼叫此方法會導致擲回。Calling this method will cause a to be thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不包含具有指定之索引鍵項目維持不變。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 會不引發任何例外狀況。No exception is raised. 這個方法不會移除索引鍵從。This method does not remove keys from the . 您必須取得特定從集合移除的索引鍵，但是，不可能因為您通常會從遠端存取這類的字典。You must obtain the specific from the collection to remove those keys, but that might not be possible because you are typically accessing such a dictionary remotely.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ Source { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要從其中載入資源的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri] (~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to load resources from.

value.span: 外部資源字典的來源位置。

span.span: The source location of an external resource dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，指定為一個組件的 URI 參考會當做 file 的資源或內容建置動作的應用程式建置專案的資源字典的位置。Typically, is specified as a Pack URI, which references the location of a resource dictionary that is included as a noncompiled Resource or Content build action by your application building project. 如需組件的 URI 格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 中的組件 Uri](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)。For details on the Pack URI format, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md). 一般而言，屬性設定僅適用於指定給屬性 (屬性項目中為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或為程式碼中集合的項目)。Generally, the property is set only for a that is specified for the property (either as a property element in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or as a item of the collection in code). 在此內容中設定的值將會合併，請參閱提供的字典內容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]到目前。In this context, setting the value for will merge the dictionary contents found at the supplied [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] into the current . 任何載入失敗會導致擲回例外狀況。Any load failures will cause an exception to be thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會指定兩個項目會合併至主要。The following example specifies two elements to be merged into the primary . [!code-xaml[ResourceMergeDictionary#MergedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ResourceMergeDictionary/CS/default.xaml#mergedxaml)]

span.span: The first position in the specified to receive the copied contents.

span.span: Not supported.

summary.span: 此「字典」實作不支援。

span.span: Not supported by this Dictionary implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別不支援依名稱註冊。The class does not support registering by name. 它會改為使用金鑰。It uses keys instead. 呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用。Calling this method does nothing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Values { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與這個 中包含之索引鍵相關聯的所有值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all values associated with keys contained in this .
The collection of all values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性存在，是因為所需，但通常不是適用於大多數案例。This property exists because it is required by , but generally is not useful for most scenarios. 傳回的值不包括內的值。The returned values do not include values within the . 集合也基本字典中值的快照集。Also the collection is a snapshot of the values in the base dictionary. 如果您隨後變更至此，預存將不會反映這些變更。If you subsequently make changes to this , a stored will not reflect the changes.
